channel.title: Need help with runserver/compile
channel.description:
when i click compile this comes up
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
when i click runeserver, this comes up
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
i used mod tharoks Server Guide and i edited enviormental variables and stuff like that but i have no idea what wrong here?! :confused:

item.title: Need help with runserver/compile
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

this is normal just press a key to continue and all files will be updated if you added changes to it .

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

this mean that you either don’t have youre java installed …
check if you have both version , jdk , jre other wise go download them

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
this is for jdk ( jdk6.0)

if you play normal rs you should have jre allready

Read full topic
